1.content: Remove hardcoded admin credentials from AuthContext
1.details: Remove ADMIN_EMAIL and ADMIN_PASSWORD constants from AuthContext.tsx and implement dynamic credential checking

2.details:

2. Implement secure password hashing/storage
3. Add setup completion tracking
4. Redirect to setup if no admin exists

3.details:

2. Remove pre-filled credentials

4. Implement secure login flow

4.details:

2. Add option to change admin credentials
3. Implement secure session management

5.details: Commit and push all security improvements to the VisionGuard repository using the existing GitHub token
